newsitem.title: USA: CBOT rice closes quietly lower despite firm cash.
newsitem.headline: CBOT rice closes quietly lower despite firm cash.

text.p: CBOT rice futures closed slightly lower in "typical" holiday trading and the slip occurred despite a firm cash market, traders said.
"It was just a holiday market but the values are holding with some light business done above the board price," a trader said.
Rice futures volume was estimated by CBOT at 100 contracts, below Thursday's tally of 325 lots.
Rice futures closed five to 10 cents lower, with July down five at $1.44 per cwt.
